description:
There’s nothing like the look on a guy’s face right before he’s about to get fucked for the first time.

“This is your first time getting fucked by a guy?” I asked.

“Yeah,” Rodney replied.

“What do you think about that?”

“It’s different,” he said.  “I’m used to girls so I dunno…”

Wesley was sitting right next to him with a big smile on his face.  I think Wesley has finally figured out that he likes to fuck ass.  Especially nice asses like Rodney’s.

Now when I say that Wesley fucked Rodney upside down, backward, and forward I mean it literally.

Our little gymnast boy Rodney took it like a man.  A very flexible man…
title: Rodney & Wesley
